Sql.query: insert into vce_arrpar_grupo_cab( pecacodi, grupocodi, apgcfccodi, apgcabccbef, apgcabccmarr, apgcabccadic, apgcabflagcalcmanual ) values( :pecacodi, :grupocodi, :apgcfccodi, :apgcabccbef, :apgcabccmarr, :apgcabccadic, :apgcabflagcalcmanual )

update vce_arrpar_grupo_cab set apgcabccbef = :apgcabccbef, apgcabccmarr = :apgcabccmarr, apgcabccadic = :apgcabccadic, apgcabflagcalcmanual = :apgcabflagcalcmanual where pecacodi = :pecacodi and grupocodi = :grupocodi and apgcfccodi = :apgcfccodi
delete from vce_arrpar_grupo_cab where pecacodi = :pecacodi and grupocodi = :grupocodi and apgcfccodi = :apgcfccodi
delete from vce_arrpar_grupo_cab where pecacodi = :pecacodi and grupocodi = :grupocodi
delete from vce_arrpar_grupo_det where pecacodi = :pecacodi and grupocodi = :grupocodi

select co.pecacodi, co.grupocodi, co.apgcfccodi, co.apgcabccbef, co.apgcabccmarr, co.apgcabccadic, co.apgcabflagcalcmanual, gr.gruponomb from vce_arrpar_grupo_cab co left join pr_grupo gr on co.grupocodi = gr.grupocodi where co.pecacodi = {0} and co.grupocodi = {1} and co.apgcfccodi = '{2}' order by gr.gruponomb

select co.pecacodi, co.grupocodi, co.apgcfccodi, co.apgcabccbef, co.apgcabccmarr, co.apgcabccadic, co.apgcabflagcalcmanual, gr.gruponomb from vce_arrpar_grupo_cab co left join pr_grupo gr on co.grupocodi = gr.grupocodi where co.pecacodi = {0} and co.apgcabflagcalcmanual = '1' order by gr.gruponomb

SELECT EMP.EMPRNOMB ,SUM(COM.APGCABCCBEF) AS "APGCABCCBEF" ,SUM(COM.APGCABCCMARR) AS "APGCABCCMARR" ,SUM(COM.APGCABCCADIC) AS "APGCABCCADIC" ,SUM(NVL(COM.APGCABCCBEF,0)+NVL(COM.APGCABCCMARR,0)+NVL(COM.APGCABCCADIC,0)) as "APGCABTOTAL" FROM VCE_ARRPAR_GRUPO_CAB COM LEFT JOIN PR_GRUPO GR ON COM.GRUPOCODI = GR.GRUPOCODI LEFT JOIN SI_EMPRESA EMP ON GR.EMPRCODI = EMP.EMPRCODI WHERE COM.PECACODI = {0} AND COM.APGCFCCODI = '{1}' GROUP BY EMP.EMPRNOMB

INSERT INTO VCE_ARRPAR_GRUPO_CAB( PECACODI, GRUPOCODI, APGCFCCODI, APGCABCCBEF, APGCABCCMARR, APGCABCCADIC, APGCABFLAGCALCMANUAL ) SELECT {0}, GRUPOCODI, APGCFCCODI, APGCABCCBEF, APGCABCCMARR, APGCABCCADIC,APGCABFLAGCALCMANUAL FROM VCE_ARRPAR_GRUPO_CAB WHERE PECACODI = {1}

INSERT INTO VCE_ARRPAR_GRUPO_DET( PECACODI, GRUPOCODI, APGCFCCODI, APGDETFECINIPER ,APGDETNUMARR, APGDETNUMPAR, APGDETPRECIOAPLICXARR, APGDETPRECIOAPLICXPAR ,APGDETNUMINC, APGDETNUMDIS, APGDETPRECIOAPLICXINCGEN ,APGDETPRECIOAPLICXDISGEN ) SELECT {0}, GRUPOCODI, APGCFCCODI, APGDETFECINIPER ,APGDETNUMARR, APGDETNUMPAR, APGDETPRECIOAPLICXARR, APGDETPRECIOAPLICXPAR ,APGDETNUMINC, APGDETNUMDIS, APGDETPRECIOAPLICXINCGEN ,APGDETPRECIOAPLICXDISGEN FROM VCE_ARRPAR_GRUPO_DET WHERE PECACODI = {1}
